Sports Medicine, https://doi.org/10.1007/s40279-020-00984-1 About IISER Bhopal: The Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER) Bhopal is a premier research institute of the Government of India. It is a part of the prestigious Indian Institutes of Science Education and Research (IISER) network. The institute is located in the picturesque campus of the Indian Institute of Forest Management (IIFM), Bhopal. The institute was established in the year 2008. The institute is a multi-disciplinary research institute with a focus on basic and applied research in the frontier areas of science and technology. The institute has been ranked among the top 100 institutes in India by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in 2019. Website: https:/ / www. iiserbhopal. ac. in/ About the author: Dr. S. Kumar is a Senior Scientist at the Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER) Bhopal. He is a recipient of the prestigious Shanti Swarup Bhatnagar Prize for Science and Technology (2020) and the National Bioscience Award for Career Development of the Department of Biotechnology (DBT, India).
